name: Panda Star Run
description:
Entry for Jam Go Jam!

Controls:

Hold spacebar to increase altitude

Criteria:

Endless Runner - entire game is played in a single level that keeps going till the player runs out of lives!

Happy - whimsical dreamy theme of a girl riding a squishy panda catching stars! Feels happy to me.

Hyperactive - The animations are indeed hyperactive as the panda keeps afloat by running furiously.  Gameplay also increases in speed definitely lending to hyperactivity.

Chiptune - Music by Daniel Docherty. Much wow. Very retro.

Thanks to B. Soo for helping implement a high score system. Had a blast making this game.

Credits

Evil Art Bunny - all art assets and programming (contact person on Jam Go Jam Discord server)
B. Soo - programming high score tables
Daniel Docherty - all music and sound effects

Apologies - high score table sometimes only updates a little after the round so is seen on subsequent rounds.
